task_definition_name: Mifos - Write a Research Brief on PSD2 Payment Services Directive
Mifos - Write a Research Brief on PSD2 Payment Services Directive

text:
Greetings Dear Mentor,
I've created the required document on the Directive for the completion of this task. The document endows wonderful flow charts and eye captivating visual infographics that add to the accurate research. The document is neatly presented in a pdf version. Here are the sub-topics around which the brief was woven:-

1) Introduction 
2) History of the Payment Services Directory System
3) General Impact on the Payment Landscape
4) Timeline of the Directive
5) Scope for the Directive
6) PSD2 for the Banking Sector
7) A look at Card Systems
8) Footprint on the Consumers
9) Increased Competition
10) International Payments
11) Key changes from the former
12) Enabled Opportunities for Financial Institutions
13) Challenging Consequences Created
14) Operating Model Implications
15) Sources

All the sources that served as the written basis for this brief are listed under the sources subheading and link to the different articles used for the brief. I've attached the pdf version of the Document as well as a shared link. Hope you consider it :)

Link to the Doc:- https://docs.google.com/document/d/1KqHb59IPgg2za9PSYpAJtRyGOL0LmRqYWRWkxvejhZU/edit?usp=sharing

PDF version : RESEARCH_BRIEF_ON_THE_REVISED_PAYMENT_SERVICE_DIRECTIVE_FRAMEWORK.pdf (480.8 kB)

Best Regards,
Rohan Bhasin
